name: Product Top Seller
description: Image, text overlay, 'Shop Now' control that links user to a PDP of the best selling product in a category; Image is defined by the selected product

attribute_definition_groups.name: Search Parameters
attribute_definition_groups.description: Please select a category to search for a top seller.

attribute_definitions.name: Storefront Catalog Category
attribute_definitions.description: Please select a storefront catalog category to get its top selling product.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Editorial Copy
attribute_definition_groups.description: Please specify the editorial copy that will be displayed to customers when this tile is published.

attribute_definitions.name: Optional Heading
attribute_definitions.description: Optionally, specify text copy to include in the tile display.  The default is the product name.

attribute_definitions.name: Optional Promotion Message
attribute_definitions.description: Optionally, specify the promotion text (i.e. message and coupon code) to show below the heading.
